name: In a Hole
tip:
Daggers earn 0 points, so rounds you play them you probably can't win.

Shadow is best if you play it as late in a round as possible, since it gets cheaper.

name: The Price of Truth
tip: Playing a card after Hungry Ghost makes it effectively worth 0 points (4 - 4). But if you don't, the negative Nourish will stay until the next round.

name: Where it All Began
tip: Once Imprison gives the opponent negative Nourish, it makes it harder for them to escape the next round.

name: Nightmare
tip: Try to play fewer cards than the opponent so that Nightmare can trigger and come back.

name: Sickness
tip: Sickness won't cover your Morning abilities or make Heron more expensive, and it gives you something to play if the opponent gives it back to you.

name: Victim
tip: Play on a round where you have negative Nourish for maximum effect.

name: Vampire
tip: If the opponent has negative points, Vampire becomes worth more than normal.

name: Boa
tip: Negative Nourish can also trigger Boa's condition.

name: Lost in Shadow
tip: Cards like Shadow still have base-cost 6 even if they reduce the cost to play them.
